1.question: How do I earn points?
1.answer:
Before you pay inside, scan the Rewards Card barcode in your app, enter the phone number associated with your account or scan/swipe your Rewards + Debit card when you check out. This will earn ensure you earn points and apply all your eligible discounts from coupons and redeemed rewards.

For fuel purchases, enter your phone number at the pump or at the register inside the store or swipe your Rewards + Debit card as payment. When pre-paying for fuel inside the store, you can enter your phone number on the pin pad, scan your Rewards Card barcode in your app or scan/swipe your Rewards+Debit card.

You earn 1 point per gallon of gas and 4 points per $1 spent on qualifying products in-store.

RaceTrac may change, modify, suspend and/or eliminate this rewards program without notice.

2.question: What is a qualifying product?
2.answer:
Inside the store, you earn 4 points per $1 spent on all products except for alcohol, tobacco, lottery, and services (like money orders or gift cards). All fuel grades earn you 1 point per gallon.

RaceTrac may change, modify, suspend and/or eliminate this rewards program without notice.

3.question: What can I do with my points?
3.answer:
You can use any points you've earned to redeem free food and drinks and fuel discounts at RaceTrac stores. To see what you can redeem, tap the "REDEEM POINTS" button on your home screen.

After you've selected the items you want to redeem, they'll get added to your Rewards Card. When you scan the item and your Rewards Card at checkout, the discount automatically comes off! Changed your mind about a reward you already redeemed? No problem! Any unused Rewards will expire after 24 hours, and the points will be added back to your balance.

RaceTrac may change, modify, suspend and/or eliminate this rewards program without notice.

4.question: Do my points expire?
4.answer: Any unused points expire 12 months after you earned them. When you use your points to redeem items in the app, we will always use your oldest points first.

5.question: What are the levels?
5.answer:
As you earn more points, you climb in levels and unlock greater rewards. Any points you redeem for free items do not affect your progress toward the next level. Here's what you can look forward to by reaching higher levels.

Duke of Dog
Lifetime Points Needed: 0
Rewards Earned: Nothing yet!

Rewards Earned: FREE medium fountain/frozen or small coffee drink EVERY WEEK.

Lifetime Points Needed: 3500

RaceTrac may change, modify, suspend and/or eliminate this rewards program without notice.

6.question: Does my level expire?
6.answer:
Your tier level will expire after one (1) year if you do not achieve the points required to maintain or exceed your current level. Don't worry — we'll give lots of opportunities to accelerate your points earning throughout the year. Make sure you're opted into communications to receive these exclusive offers!

RaceTrac may change, modify, suspend and/or eliminate this rewards program without notice.

7.question: How do I redeem coupons?
7.answer: All coupons are already added to your Rewards Card.  Just grab the items you want, scan your Rewards Card barcode when you check out, and watch the savings roll in!

8.question: My phone number is not working at the pump.

answer.forUnauthorised: Make sure you entered a phone number under your Account Settings. This links your phone number to your RaceTrac Rewards account.
answer.forAuthorized: Make sure you entered a phone number under your Account Settings. This links your phone number to your RaceTrac Rewards account. If it's still not working, contact us!

9.question: How do I add gift cards to the app?
9.answer:
Tap on the Gift Card button at the bottom of the home screen. Follow instructions on that screen to load up your gift cards!

RaceTrac is committed to your security, so personal information, including name, credit card number, and billing address are encrypted and will not be stored by RaceTrac.

10.question: How do I pay with an app gift card?
10.answer: Tap the Pay button from the Checkout screen to pull up your available gift cards. Tap a gift card to flip it over and reveal the barcode, then scan the gift card's barcode to pay. Just remember to scan your Rewards Card barcode first to earn your points!

11.question: How do I check the balance on my gift card?
11.answer: Tap the Gift Card button at the bottom of the home screen, or tap Pay from the Checkout screen to see your available gift cards. Tap any gift card to flip over. You'll see the gift card's barcode and current balance.

12.question: How do I deactivate my account?

answer.forUnauthorised: Please contact us to deactivate your account. Once your account is deactivated, you will no longer have access to your points, rewards or benefits and they cannot be reinstated.
answer.forAuthorized: Please contact us to deactivate your account. Once your account is deactivated, you will no longer have access to your points, rewards or benefits and they cannot be reinstated. Contact us!
